# airbyte_source_instatus (Resource)

SourceInstatus Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "airbyte_source_instatus" "my_source_instatus" {
  configuration = {
    api_key     = "...my_api_key..."
    source_type = "instatus"
  }
  name         = "Bertha Marks"
  workspace_id = "0d6a1831-c87a-4df5-96fd-f1ad837ae80c"
}
```

- `configuration` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration))

- `secret_id` (String) Optional secretID obtained through the public API OAuth redirect flow.

### Read-Only

- `source_id` (String)
- `source_type` (String)

### Nested Schema for `configuration`

Required:

- `api_key` (String) Instatus REST API key
